exp-1-text: Development of web applications participating in frontend and backend development tasks as part of teams working under Agile, Scrum, and Kanban methodologies using the MERN stack (React.js, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL).
exp-2-text: Development of websites using WordPress and Elementor, development of PHP web applications using the MVC pattern with Symfony and Laravel, creation of RESTful APIs, consumption of RESTful APIs, and development of frontend and mobile web applications for Android and iOS using Vue.js and Ionic.

description: Full-stack web developer with over four years of experience creating user-centric solutions in both front- and back-end environments. My specialty is developing RESTful APIs, web applications with modern interfaces, and hybrid mobile apps for enterprises and businesses. Committed to constant learning. Currently learning to program in Go (Golang) to expand my range of options and improve my skills in robust and efficient architectures.
card-1-text: Design and develop modern, responsive, and customized websites tailored to your needs and goals. I ensure that each project is attractive, functional, and optimized to deliver an exceptional user experience, achieving efficient and professional performance.
card-2-text: I create dynamic and scalable web applications using cutting-edge technologies to ensure speed, security, and ease of use. Each application is designed to meet the specific needs of your business.
card-3-text: I improve your website's search engine ranking by applying advanced SEO strategies. From content optimization to increasing loading speed and site structure, I help you attract more visitors and convert them into potential customers.
card-4-text: I extract, analyze, and structure valuable data from the web efficiently and automatically. If you need key information for market research, competitor analysis, or any other purpose, I can develop custom tools to simplify the process and provide you with accurate data.
card-5-text: I design and program secure and efficient APIs that enable seamless integration between different platforms and applications. Whether for connecting services, managing databases, or facilitating communication between systems, I ensure the API is scalable, secure, and well-documented.
card-6-text: I develop innovative and customized mobile applications for iOS and Android, ensuring intuitive design, smooth navigation, and optimal performance. I focus on creating apps that deliver the best user experience.
card-7-text: I analyze, identify, and fix errors on websites and applications to ensure their proper functioning. I take care of finding the root cause and applying the necessary solutions to make everything work.
